text:
Applications are invited for the posts of Computer Operator and Programming Assistant by the Government ITI here. The applicants must have a basic qualification of Class X, along with the completion of certificate course in Computer Operator and Programming Assistant, and must hold a minimum three years experience.

The vacancies are being filled on a monthly stipend of Rs. 20,000. Applications are invited from destitute widows; those who had inter-community marriage; dependents of ex-servicemen; those who had donated land to the government, and physically challenged.

Duly filled forms must be submitted to the office of the Principal, Government ITI, HCF Post, Hosur - 635110 by January 18.
title: Applications invited
